alert.note: Alert for Hale; Hockley; Lamb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 5:31PM CDT until June 23 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hockley County in northwestern Texas... Western Hale County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Lamb County in northwestern Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spade, or 8 miles east of Littlefield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plainview, Littlefield, Hale Center, Olton, Cotton Center, Fieldton, Spade, Halfway and Edmonson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
